content: We are proud of the company's 2022 and fourth quarter financial performance, particularly the continued growth of adjusted EBITDA profitability, especially given that this performance was driven by organic revenue growth. In terms of 2023, outlook and guidance, net revenue is projected to be in the range of $230 million to $240 million representing year-over-year growth of 47% measured at the midpoint. Our guidance, I mean, we already mentioned, the Orinter numbers, when we close the transaction a few weeks ago, which was in the region of $9 million of EBITDA, in the first year or so, as you know, it's customary to proceed with integration.
